content: Your Chance to Win a FREE Conference Pass to Pay Per Click Summit SEO Events K By: kellylarsen May 2, 2008 This YouMoz entry was submitted by one of our community members. The author’s views are entirely their own (excluding an unlikely case of hypnosis) and may not reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! K By: kellylarsen May 2, 2008 Your Chance to Win a FREE Conference Pass to Pay Per Click Summit SEO Events This YouMoz entry was submitted by one of our community members. The author’s views are entirely their own (excluding an unlikely case of hypnosis) and may not reflect the views of Moz. Intro from Rebecca: Normally I'm not one to publish promotions of this nature, but it appears that they have generously offered SEOmoz members a discount on the conference pass, so I thought I'd let this one slide. :) PPC Summit is Searching for the Best Search Marketing Strategy Contest We're calling all internet marketers to submit your proven most effective Search Marketing strategy or technique that increased your conversions! It's easy, go to the PPC Summit contest form here to submit your best practice: http://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=ni1n_2bjYybQuH4PKJaaumqA_3d_3d Answer the following questions (on the form at the above link): What Increased your search marketing ROI last year? What one thing could you point to and say “THAT made the difference!” Only one submission per person and make sure to include your name and email in the spaces provided. The Best SEM Strategy winner will be chosen on May 9 and wins a FREE FULL CONFERENCE PASS TO THE NEXT PPC SUMMIT! PPC Summit will notify the winner via email by May 12. If your submission is chosen as the winner, you will win a FREE two-day conference pass to the PPC Summit of your choice (San Francisco May 19-20 or Los Angeles Sept. 25-26). To ensure your seat at the next PPC Summit, register today with your SEOmoz Reader 10% Discount code MOZ. Click here and Save 10%, Plus $200: www.ppcsummit.com/overview.html?blog The PPC Summits are educational two-day Internet Marketing workshops which connect you with the world’s leading pay per click experts. You won't want to miss the upcoming PPC Summit to learn from the Microsoft Keynote and other industry leaders during two full days of expert SEM lead generation and sales producing strategies. Thank you for participating. Good luck! Update: There's still time to submit your entry for the Best Search Marketing Strategy. We extended the contest to close on MONDAY, MAY 12, at 5:00 PM. Copied! Back to Top
